import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link, Outlet } from 'react-router-dom' import { setIsSearchBoxVisible } from '../../features/ui/navbar' import { Logo } from '../../shared/images' import { ROUTE_PATHS } from '../../shared/constants/route-paths' import { navbarLiterals } from '../../shared/constants/navbar-literals' const Navbar = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { isSearchBoxVisible } = useSelector(state => state.navbar) const onSearchBoxPress = () => { dispatch(setIsSearchBoxVisible(!isSearchBoxVisible)) } return ( <>

{navbarLiterals.WRITE['en']}

{navbarLiterals.SIGN_IN['en']} {navbarLiterals.SIGN_UP['en']}
) } export default Navbar
